messages.title: Plan for Britain's Future
messages.content: We have an ambitious plan for the future of our country, where every person, every community, and our planet can thrive.

messages.title: Dear friend,
messages.content: For too many people, things aren't working as they should be. Both the Conservatives and Labour are stuck in the past, failing time and again to deliver a better future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Liberal Democrat government will stop Brexit.
A policy related to addressing climate change issues.
A policy focused on creating a more equitable economic system.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give every child the best start in life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A policy to improve opportunities and outcomes for children.
A policy to improve mental health services across the country.

issues.brexitEurope: A Liberal Democrat government will stop Brexit.
issues.education: Give every child the best start in life.
issues.governance: We have an ambitious plan for the future of our country.

leaflet.personalStatement: Both the Conservatives and Labour are stuck in the past, failing time and again to deliver a better future.

images.caption: Jo Swinson's Plan for Britain's Future
